snippet: JAHARIS--Michael. The Little Orchestra Society mourns the passing of Michael Jaharis. Michael, his wife Mary, and their family have been generous benefactors over many years. We extend our condolences to Mary, Kathy, and the Jaharis family. The Board and staff of The Little Orchestra Society 1/3
lead_paragraph: JAHARIS--Michael. The Little Orchestra Society mourns the passing of Michael Jaharis. Michael, his wife Mary, and their family have been generous benefactors over many years. We extend our condolences to Mary, Kathy, and the Jaharis family. The Board and staff of The Little Orchestra Society 1/3
